rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with subtle Mediterranean design elements and floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light.
An expansive living room integrating Mediterranean style aesthetics and ample space for family gatherings. Open to the central courtyard via large sliding doors with floor-to-ceiling windows.
A spacious dining area complementing the living room and featuring open vistas to the garden through a set of floor-to-ceiling windows.
A modern kitchen designed in Mediterranean style with high ceilings and large windows for ventilation and natural light.

openings.description: Main entrance door leading to the villa.
Large opening connecting living room and courtyard with floor-to-ceiling glass windows.

courtyard.description: A central courtyard designed to enhance natural ventilation and align with Vastu principles for balanced energy flow.

garden.description: Large garden area incorporating Mediterranean landscaping with native plants and sustainable water management practices.
